languages.text: "Кхм... у нас был сеанс общекорабельной связи, Лорд-капитан".
"Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Кхм... у нас был сеанс общекорабельной связи, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Ahem... we had a ship-wide broadcast session, Lord Captain."
"Ahem... we had a ship-wide broadcast session, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Hum... Je... une diffusion vient d'être entendue dans tout le vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Je... une diffusion a été entendue dans tout le vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: “呃……刚刚的广播整艘船都听到了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “呃……舰长大人，刚刚的广播会话整艘船都听到了。”

languages.text: "Ähem ... Wir hatten eine schiffsweite Übertragung, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ähem ... wir hatten eine schiffsweite Übertragungssitzung, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «Ejem... toda la nave ha escuchado cierta transmisión, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Ejem... toda la nave ha escuchado cierta transmisión, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「ええと…艦内放送を行いました、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「ええと…艦内放送を行いました、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Öhöm. Az önce tüm geminin duyduğu bir yayın gerçekleşti Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Ahem... We just had a ship-wide broadcast, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Öhöm. Az önce tüm geminin duyduğu bir yayın gerçekleşti Lord Kaptan."
